original_title: Ben Griffin: Golfer says he ‘overdosed’ on creatine during BMW Championship | CNN
article_summary: American golfer Ben Griffin experienced shaking and tremors during the BMW Championship due to accidentally swallowing a large amount of creatine, a common supplement among gym enthusiasts. Despite the initial physical effects, Griffin recovered and finished tied for 12th, vowing to limit his creatine intake in the future.</s>
